Posts.Content: I know how u feel...4 years ago I was made redundant from a fantastic career I loved, the very same week my husband was diagnosed with Stomach Cancer...he died a few months later. I had a nervous breakdown & anorexia. I have no children & my mother & sister turned their back on me years ago & never came forward when I was widowed. I started a new job I loved a few weeks back. After 2 weeks there, I was diagnosed with Aggressive Ductal Breast Cancer, a Cyst on my Spine & undergoing tests for a "serious underlying blood disorder, likely to be a rare form of Leaukhaemia. I had my breast op a week ago & am still in a lot of pain. I do hope like you, it can only get better. It is a lonely journey when you live alone too...

Posts.Title: NPI Scale

Posts.Content: After Lumpectomy failed to get all the cancer & found in Lymph Nodes too..got "HER 2 Stage 2, Grade 3 +" tbc by upcoming Masectomy...but sed I am 5.64 on scale below, BUT I also have Lymphoma...wondered how this affects that rating??? Puzzled... NPI = [0.2 x S] + N + G Where: S is the size of the index lesion in centimetres N is the node status: 0 nodes = 1, 1-4 nodes = 2, >4 nodes = 3 G is the grade of tumour: Grade I =1, Grade II =2, Grade III =3 InterpretationEdit Score 5-year survival >/=2.0 to </=2.4 93% >2.4 to </=3.4 85% >3.4 to </=5.4 70% >5.4 50%
